mapper.select: SELECT R_NUM, L_IDX, M_ID, L_SUBJECT, L_CONTENT, L_DATE, L_UPVOTE, L_REVIEWCOUNT, M_ADDRESS, LC_CNT, P_ROUTE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, B.* FROM (SELECT LOCALADVICE.*, PROFILE_IMAGE.P_ROUTE FROM LOCALADVICE, PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE UPPER(L_SUBJECT) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%' AND LOCALADVICE.M_ID=PROFILE_IMAGE.M_ID AND PROFILE_IMAGE.P_MAIN=1 ORDER BY L_IDX DESC) B) WHERE UPPER(L_SUBJECT) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%' AND (R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end})
SELECT COUNT(L_SUBJECT) FROM LOCALADVICE WHERE UPPER(L_SUBJECT) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOCALADVICE(L_IDX, M_ID, L_SUBJECT, L_CONTENT, L_DATE, L_UPVOTE, L_REVIEWCOUNT, M_ADDRESS) VALUES (LOCALADVICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{m_id}, #{l_subject}, #{l_content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{m_address})
mapper.select: SELECT L.*, PI.P_ROUTE FROM LOCALADVICE L, PROFILE_IMAGE PI WHERE L.L_IDX=#{l_idx} AND PI.M_ID = L.M_ID AND PI.P_MAIN=1
SELECT M_ID, P_ROUTE FROM PROFILE_IMAGE WHERE P_MAIN = 1 AND M_ID = #{m_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE LOCALADVICE SET L_SUBJECT=#{l_subject}, L_CONTENT=#{l_content} WHERE L_IDX=#{l_idx}
UPDATE LOCALADVICE SET L_REVIEWCOUNT = L_REVIEWCOUNT+1 WHERE L_IDX = #{l_idx }
UPDATE LOCALADVICE SET LC_CNT = LC_CNT+1 WHERE L_IDX=#{l_idx}
UPDATE LOCALADVICE SET LC_CNT = LC_CNT-1 WHERE L_IDX=#{l_idx}
UPDATE LOCALADVICE SET L_UPVOTE = L_UPVOTE+1 WHERE L_IDX=#{l_idx}
UPDATE LOCALADVICE SET L_UPVOTE = L_UPVOTE-1 WHERE L_IDX=#{l_idx}
